CustomField.description: Day of Week formatted like a crontab entry. Comma separated values, with a * and ? as wildcards. 1 is Monday, 7 is Sunday, you may use the first three letters instead of a number.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Day of week formatted like a crontab entry. Comma separated values, with a * and ? as wildcards. 1 is Sunday, 7 is Saturday. You may use the first three letters instead of a number. e.g. SUN-SAT
CustomField.label: Day of Week
